thread.title: Nicki Minaj Twins With Kim Kardashian in Light Pink Latex

author: ELLE South Africa
title: Nicki Minaj Twins With Kim Kardashian in Light Pink Latex
text:
A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Mar 12, 2017 at 5:38pm PDT 
Taking to Instagram on Sunday, the rapper shared a slew of photos rocking mile-long hair; a sexy, light pink latex crop top; matching latex hot pants; and Barbie-pink lace-up boots for a surprise appearance during Drake‚Äôs Boy Meets World tour stop in Paris. Needless to say, Onika was feeling herself‚Äîand looked absolutely flawless. A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Mar 12, 2017 at 1:30pm PDT A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Mar 12, 2017 at 2:00pm PDT A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Mar 12, 2017 at 2:09pm PDT A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Mar 12, 2017 at 2:48pm PDT A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Mar 12, 2017 at 5:17pm PDT While as per always, Nicki made the look her own, many were quick to point out that her outfit bore a striking resemblance to one of Kim Kardashian‚Äôs most iconic looks from back in 2014, when she wore a light pink latex dress to the launch of her fragrance ‚ÄúFleur Fatale.‚Äù But stunning outfit(s) aside, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge that Nicki was also absolutely amazing during the show itself, where she performed her new track ‚ÄúNo Frauds‚Äù with Drake along with a couple of her biggest hits. She also took time to acknowledge her love for her fellow Young Money rapper right in the middle of the concert. ‚ÄúHe means the world to me, and I want you guys to know that,‚Äù she said, according to Uproxx . ‚ÄúI just want to beg you guys to chase your dreams. Don‚Äôt let anyone or anything get in your motherfucking way.‚Äù A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Mar 12, 2017 at 5:25pm PDT 
‚Ä¶ And clearly, the love is mutual. A post shared by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Mar 12, 2017 at 3:59pm PDT üå∫üåÖ A post shared by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Mar 12, 2017 at 5:04pm PDT A post shared by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Mar 12, 2017 at 5:14pm PDT
